item.title: Shells Under Threat
item.description: Ocean Acidification is a progressing issue in the face of climate change. Jenny Rheuben is a Research Associate with WHOI (Woods Hole Oceanographic Institute) who focuses on the effects of climate change on coastal environments. Here, Rhueban speaks to the threat of ocean acidification, an example of how climate change impacts our natural resources and how people are in turn affected by that. Jenny Rheuben is a Research Associate at the Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution While addressing the threat of ocean acidification, we must first be able to monitor it.
